Developer Terms of Use
des: DevOps Chats are “fireside” podcasts featuring Alan Shimel, CEO and Founder of MediaOps and Mitchel Ashley, CEO of Accelerated Strategies Group, discussing relevant topics with luminaries and thought leaders in the DevOps and security industries.
